resolution_description: TripAdvisor Ranking can revolutionize the fight against fake reviews by integrating advanced AI-driven sentiment analysis and biometric verification technology, allowing users to authenticate their reviews through facial recognition and emotional analysis, thereby ensuring genuine feedback while enhancing user trust and engagement.

Restaurants can resolve the issue of fake reviews by implementing a unique "Dine & Review" program, where customers can submit real-time feedback directly through interactive digital menus during their dining experience, incentivized by immediate rewards like personalized dish recommendations or exclusive menu previews, ensuring authenticity and enhancing customer engagement.

required_participants.reasoning: Restaurants are essential to implement the 'Dine & Review' program, as they will be responsible for integrating the interactive digital menus and managing the real-time feedback system. Their participation ensures that the program is tailored to their specific needs and enhances customer engagement effectively.

Tourists-customers are crucial as they provide the real-time feedback that the program aims to capture. Their engagement and willingness to participate in the 'Dine & Review' program will be key to its success and the authenticity of the reviews collected.

The three startup founders can provide the technological and strategic support necessary for the implementation and scaling of the 'Dine & Review' program. Their expertise will help in designing the interactive digital menus and ensuring that the program meets the needs of both restaurants and customers.
